snippet: The “Hunger Games” franchise, as did the Harry Potter and “Twilight” series, hopes to demonstrate the art in splitting a final chapter into two installments.
abstract: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 1 provides latest example of an epic Hollywood franchise that has decided to split its final chapter into two films; tactic can be successful if films feel worthwhile in their own right, but runs risk of being perceived as a money grab.
lead_paragraph: The “Hunger Games” franchise, as did the Harry Potter and “Twilight” series, hopes to demonstrate the art in splitting a final chapter into two installments.

headline.seo: ‘The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 1,’ Is the Latest Penultimate Franchise Film
headline.main: Now, the Final Chapter. O.K., Half of It.
headline.print_headline: Now, the Final Chapter. O.K., Half of It.
